Remove internal control targets from data matrices

remove_ic_from_matrix.Rd

Helper function that removes specified internal control (IC) targets from wide-format data matrices by filtering out rows matching the IC target names.

Usage

remove_ic_from_matrix(mat, ic_targets)

Arguments

mat

A matrix or data frame with targets as rownames

ic_targets

Character vector of internal control target names to remove

Value

The input matrix with IC target rows removed, or NULL if input is NULL. Maintains matrix structure even when only one row remains (drop = FALSE).

Details

This function is used internally to clean data matrices by removing internal control targets that should not be included in downstream analysis.
